name: bewitchingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very attractive or makes you feel very interested: She has a bewitchingly crooked smile and flashing eyes. The story is bewitchingly mysterious. Related word
bewitching
More examplesFewer examplesThe sun was setting bewitchingly over the river.With this piece, he has produced some of his most bewitchingly beautiful music. He is a bewitchingly original storyteller who keeps his audience riveted.The characters in this bewitchingly strange drama draw us in from the beginning.She smiled bewitchingly before turning and disappearing into the night.
